body_html:
Huh... I somehow missed that FAQ section 😨.

One other problem with having hundreds of thousands of small files is that the tfdbg UI regularly freezes whenever I try to use it. Looking at strace, it looks like it's looping through all the files it created

...
newfstatat(14, "Sum_0_DebugIdentity_1503415213363935", {st_mode=S_IFREG|0664, st_size=15705, ...}, AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW) = 0
unlinkat(14, "Sum_0_DebugIdentity_1503415213363935", 0) = 0
newfstatat(14, "Sum_1_0_DebugIdentity_1503415270902805", {st_mode=S_IFREG|0664, st_size=15709, ...}, AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW) = 0
unlinkat(14, "Sum_1_0_DebugIdentity_1503415270902805", 0) = 0
...

So I guess this is really a feature request I'm asking for: is there a way to output data into a handful of very large files, rather than a huge number of small files? At least that way, tfdbg wouldn't be hang looping making syscalls for each file.

body:
Huh... I somehow missed that FAQ section 😨.

One other problem with having hundreds of thousands of small files is that the tfdbg UI regularly freezes whenever I try to use it. Looking at strace, it looks like it's looping through all the files it created

```
...
newfstatat(14, "Sum_0_DebugIdentity_1503415213363935", {st_mode=S_IFREG|0664, st_size=15705, ...}, AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW) = 0
unlinkat(14, "Sum_0_DebugIdentity_1503415213363935", 0) = 0
newfstatat(14, "Sum_1_0_DebugIdentity_1503415270902805", {st_mode=S_IFREG|0664, st_size=15709, ...}, AT_SYMLINK_NOFOLLOW) = 0
unlinkat(14, "Sum_1_0_DebugIdentity_1503415270902805", 0) = 0
...
```

So I guess this is really a feature request I'm asking for: is there a way to output data into a handful of very large files, rather than a huge number of small files? At least that way, `tfdbg` wouldn't be hang looping making syscalls for each file.
